name: Keep Me Breathing - Ludum Dare 46
description:
Fullscreen is recommended for web version

The embed web version is a bit blurry on the edges so don't hesitate to play in fullscreen!

Note regarding the RGB sliders:

- The color changes only happend 1 slider at a time. Which means you don't have to move every slider to try and get the right color.
- They are additive colors, which means adding R + G will get you Yellow. Start with the sliders set to black and play around to better understand how they work !

Your spaceship has suffered serious damage and the air recycling system is now out of services.
The only way for you and your crew to survive until repairs is to grow plants to produce oxygen.
Keep them alive long enough to grow so they can keep you breathing in return!

This game is available for Windows (32 & 64 bits) and in Web browser.

The soundtrack is available here: https://soundcloud.com/mrvarren/sets/keep-me-breathing-soundtrack

This Game has been made in less than 72 hours during the Ludum Dare 46 by 3 persons:

Musics & Sounds by MrVarren

Art by Geegaz

Code by AstroLabe & Geegaz
